attributes.action: spend goverment money in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
the goverment should were possible keep money in the UK. this would be done by awarding contracts to british companies for things like trains and aircraft carriers and by, were possible only buy things made in the UK e.g. only buying vehicles made in the UK. to further help this a reduction in VAT for british made goods.
this would insure long term success and jobs giving more tax revenue and less benefit payments.
